Create a random matrix

create_random_matrix.Rd

Creates and returns a random matrix.

create_random_matrix(
  n_row,
  n_col,
  logical_mat,
  p_zero = 0.95,
  p_set_col_zero = 0.05,
  p_set_row_zero = 0.05,
  matrix_values = seq(1L, 10L)
)

Arguments

n_row

number of rows
n_col

number of columns
logical_mat

boolean indicating whether the matrix is logical (TRUE) or integer (FALSE)
p_zero

probability an entry will be zero
p_set_col_zero

fraction of columns to set to zero
p_set_row_zero

fraction of rows to set to zero
matrix_values

set of values from which to draw the matrix entries (applicable to integer matrices only)

Value

a randomly-generated matrix in sparse format
